requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64 Bit
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core (Intel / AMD)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Dual Core (Intel / AMD)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, or 10
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128MB
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit, Windows 8.1 64-bit or Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel core i3 CPU 530 2.93GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 630
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0x compatible sound card
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit, Windows 8.1 64-bit or Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4690 3.50Ghz or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 670, similar or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0x compatible sound card
